attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: !WARNING!This app has me in an outrage when I downloaded it my brand new phone was in great condition. Suddenly I started getting notifications that I was receiving bugs I took it to the store to get fixed and they were said to be unreversable viruses. And my information was leaked the next day, coincidence? I don’t think so. Overall a terrible app delete while you can still use your phone!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review:
This app was so BAD!! I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! It gives horrible updates and it also has very annoying notifications. This app always glitches and it also ruined my phone. It’s VERY slow and makes people want to cry. So please DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP AND GIVE IT A HORRIBLE RATING. Btw I hate you trump❤️❤️❤️
Please ✨suffer✨ for me and others. It’ll make us very happy 😆. ✨our disgusting president✨. We don’t want a racist president that r*pes 13 yr olds 😘. I smell a 🧚🏻CHILD TRAFFICKER🧚🏻.

                 XOXO 😚

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE. i tried to buy food for my pet t-rex and it STOLE MY MOM. then i left the app open while i was getting a snack and it proceeded to pull my hair. i fought the app back and beat it up. then at night i went to sleep and i noticed that i was sent to the bermuda triangle, so now i’ve been stuck at this little island since 10 in the morning and i’m scared my only food resources are nothing BECAUSE THERE IS NOTHING HERE PLS SEND HELP !!!!!!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: absolute garbage
attributes.review: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE!!! i went to the store and saw an orange, it made me think about our president and i saw the app. then my phone took control and opened the app, even though i didn’t download it. it opened and all i could see were really nasty oranges with shrimps attached to them, which is why you should not get this app. unless we wanna see old oranges with VERY small shrimp, i would not recommend this app. cheers!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: As soon as I got the app, I started feeling kinda wonky. Then strange things started happening. I was walking around my neighborhood and started noticing birds following me around. The only thing that had changed in my life was getting this app. Tons of strange things started happening after getting this app like a dragon sitting outside my window watching me. As soon as I deleted the app, all these strange things suddenly stopped.

attributes.title: NOT WORTH IT
attributes.review: I got this app to support my one and only role model❤️ i was expecting a high quality app because we have such an intelligent and rich man as our president however this app is absolute trash and the amount of advertisements asking his supporters for money caused my phone to overheat and catch on fire causing my whole house to burn down. My family is now DEAD and i’m alone on the streets. So it looks like i’m voting for biden 2020✨

attributes.title: done with this app
attributes.review: I tried to get into the app but when I clicked on it, every app stopped working, I don't know if it was the app or just my phone but I'm betting on the app cause this has NEVER happened before. And when you think it couldn't have gotten worse? it does. this app deleted some of my games, even temple run 2. get this app off the app store so it can't ruin more people's phones

attributes.title: ✨🥰It stoke my vacuum desk and curtains🥵✨
attributes.review: I do NOT appreciate the my trummpy is stealing my vacuum, desk and CURTAINS 😒 hi, I’m buttli ker I’m 69 years old and here is my story😘I wanted to download this app to see my trummpy😉 and I opened the app and I see my trummpy NAKED TANING😘😉best thing ever😙buutttt I took a nap later that day and trummpy CAME INTO MY ROOM AND STOLE MY vacuum desk AND curtains!!!!! (Mind he was still taning😉) So I called my pet Dino and we went to the White House and stole his son. I am buttli ker and think you for listening to my story!

What an awful experience. Opened the app and saw awful images such as a pig disgusting. You should warn others about the awful hateful images that are shown. But the worst image shown was this orange wrinkly thing it was to disturbing my little brother saw it  and now he wakes up in the middle of the night screaming in horror recalling that 🤮🤮 do not recommend save your children would give 0 if possible 😤

attributes.title: Not even 1 star worthy
attributes.review: this app is pathetic. the information reported by this app is biased and the app itself isn’t worth installing. this app sends out 40-50 notifications throughout the day. it is an insane amount of interruptions to somebody’s day whether or not they are busy. the app also glitches after a few minutes of being turned on. would not recommend.
